title: Clustering Distributed Sensor Data Streams

author: Pedro Pereira Rodrigues, Faculdade de Ciências, University of Porto
João Gama, Laboratory of Artificial Intelligence and Decision Support, University of Porto
Luis Lopes, University of Porto
